title: The Reason Why - paragraph 5 speaker creates

content.prompt: In paragraph 5 sentences 1-9, the speaker creates the impression that James Brudenell was

choices.label: a representative of an ideal that the world no longer admires
an amusing oddity in an otherwise dull world
a man doomed to be misunderstood by his contemporaries

skill.text: Skill 5.C: Recognize and explain the use of methods of development to accomplish a purpose.
